com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Box

  • public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a box, which consists of four points: top-left, top-right, bottom-left and bottom-right. A box is responsible for checking collisions and calculating a bounding box for a Timeline.Key.Bone.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Point[] points 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Box()
      Creates a new box with no witdh and height.

      Calculates its four points for the given bone or object with the given info.
      boolean collides(Timeline.Key.Bone boneOrObject, Entity.ObjectInfo info, float x, float y)
      Returns whether the given coordinates lie inside the box of the given bone or object.
      Rectangle getBoundingRect()
      Returns a bounding box for this box.
      boolean isInside(Rectangle rect)
      Returns whether this box is inside the given rectangle.

      • collides

        public boolean collides(Timeline.Key.Bone boneOrObject,
                        Entity.ObjectInfo info,
                        float x,
                        float y)
        Returns whether the given coordinates lie inside the box of the given bone or object.
        Parameters:
        boneOrObject - the bone or object
        info - the object info of the given bone or object
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the given point lies in the box
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if info or boneOrObject is null

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(Rectangle rect)
        Returns whether this box is inside the given rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rect - the rectangle
        Returns:
        true if one of the four points is inside the rectangle
